unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of movies.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kolkata, cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of movies.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a massive comeback later this year, promising a stellar lineup of Indian and international films.
normalised: Word on the street is that the J I O M A M I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a massive comeback later this year, promising a stellar lineup of Indian and international films.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, down South, whispers suggest the Chennai International Film Festival might showcase some amazing regional talent, maybe even a documentary about the perfect biryani!
normalised: Meanwhile, down South, whispers suggest the Chennai International Film Festival might showcase some amazing regional talent, maybe even a documentary about the perfect biryani!

unnormalised: And speaking of South India, the aroma of Onam celebrations is still fresh, and many filmmakers are drawing inspiration from its rich cultural tapestry. Expect films exploring themes of family, tradition, and delicious food!
normalised: And speaking of South India, the aroma of Onam celebrations is still fresh, and many filmmakers are drawing inspiration from its rich cultural tapestry. Expect films exploring themes of family, tradition, and delicious food!

unnormalised: Indie filmmakers are also getting their due, with several smaller festivals popping up in places like Pune and Jaipur, offering a platform for fresh voices and experimental storytelling. The future of Indian cinema looks bright, folks! So grab your popcorn and get ready for a cinematic feast!
normalised: Indie filmmakers are also getting their due, with several smaller festivals popping up in places like Pune and Jaipur, offering a platform for fresh voices and experimental storytelling. The future of Indian cinema looks bright, folks! So grab your popcorn and get ready for a cinematic feast!
